Measure pulse.sentence: The nurse locates the patient's wrist to assess the pulse.
Measure pulse.subject: The nurse

Measure pulse.sentence: The nurse places two fingers on the radial artery to feel the pulse.
Measure pulse.subject: The nurse
Measure pulse.object: two fingers on the radial artery

Measure pulse.sentence: The nurse counts the number of beats felt for one minute to measure the pulse rate.
Measure pulse.subject: The nurse

Measure pulse.sentence: The nurse records the pulse rate in the patient's medical chart for future reference.
Measure pulse.subject: The nurse

Measure pulse.sentence: The nurse assesses the pulse quality to evaluate the patient's cardiovascular health.
Measure pulse.subject: The nurse
